The growth pattern for secondary stats is only dependent on the starting value at Lv.1 and if it is a percentage or flat value. The only secondary stat with a flat value is Elemental Mastery, the rest (Base ATK, Base HP, CRIT DMG, CRIT RATE, Energy Recharge) are percentage-based.

Unlike a weapon's base attack, the secondary stat of a weapon does not increase once you ascend a weapon. This means an Lv.20 weapon will have the same secondary stat value before and after its 1st ascension.

All secondary stats scale with a simple calculation based on their starting value. Every 5 levels they increase by 20% of starting value. At level 25, 50 and 75 secondary stats are approximately doubled, tripled and quadrupled respectively.
